articles.title: Lawyers want former South African leader summoned to testify
articles.description: Lawyers with a South African probe into corruption in government and state-owned companies are applying to have former President Jacob Zuma summoned to testify before it
articles.content:
The commission is investigating wide-ranging allegations of corruption during Zumas tenure from 2009 to 2018, when he resigned under pressure from the ruling party.
